request.body:
{"input":"Please choose one of the following options for a new feature:

1. **AI-powered suggestions**
2. **Advanced search filters**
3. **Collaboration tools**

Which option do you prefer?

I strongly prefer option1 (AI-powered suggestions) because it would save me the most time and provide personalized recommendations based on my usage patterns.","model":"gpt-4o-mini","instructions":"Extract the user's preference choice, how strongly they feel about it, and their explanation.","text":{"format":{"type":"json_schema","strict":true,"name":"PreferenceResponse","schema":{"properties":{"preference":{"enum":["option1","option2","option3"],"title":"Preference","type":"string"},"strength":{"enum":["strong","moderate","weak"],"title":"Strength","type":"string"},"explanation":{"title":"Explanation","type":"string"}},"required":["preference","strength","explanation"],"title":"PreferenceResponse","type":"object","additionalProperties":false}}}}
